articles.title: Gaming rettet Leben
articles.description: Statistiken zu positiven Auswirkungen von Gaming auf dein Leben.
articles.contents:
Gaming sorgt nicht für Agressionen, wie oft vermutet, sondern kann dir helfen, oderso. Lies mehr

Gaming schützt dich vor Corona. Lies mehr

Gaming baut deine Reflexe aus. Lies mehr

articles.title: Testdaten
articles.contents:
Show code
library(distill)
library(tidyverse)
library(googledrive)

Testdata_01 <- read_csv(url("https://www.dropbox.com/s/i463nncn2a68xra/SteamCharts.csv?raw=1"))

Testdata_01


# A tibble: 83,789 x 7
   gamename           year month      avg    gain   peak avg_peak_perc
   <chr>             <dbl> <chr>    <dbl>   <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>        
 1 Counter-Strike: ~  2021 Februa~ 7.41e5  -2196. 1.12e6 65.9567%

 5 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 October 6.14e5   6816. 9.44e5 65.0156%     
 6 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 Septem~ 6.07e5 -33107. 9.78e5 62.0648%     
 7 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 August  6.40e5  14057. 9.25e5 69.1586%     
 8 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 July    6.26e5 -45747. 8.58e5 72.9862%     
 9 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 June    6.72e5 -97148. 1.01e6 66.5349%     
10 Counter-Strike: ~  2020 May     7.69e5 -88809. 1.19e6 64.4228%     
# ... with 83,779 more rows

Testdata_02
